title: Creating Forms with Gravity Forms
description: Learn how to create and manage forms using Gravity Forms.

blocks.content: Gravity Forms is the most advanced form builder plugin for WordPress. In this tutorial, we'll explore how to create powerful forms that can collect and process user data effectively.

Follow these steps to create your first form:

  1. Navigate to Forms > New Form in your WordPress dashboard
  2. Give your form a name and description
  3. Start adding fields from the right panel
  4. Configure field settings and validation rules
  5. Save and embed your form

author: admin
